014package org.microbean.assign;
015
016import java.lang.constant.ClassDesc;
017import java.lang.constant.Constable;
018import java.lang.constant.ConstantDesc;
019import java.lang.constant.DynamicConstantDesc;
020import java.lang.constant.MethodHandleDesc;
021
022import java.util.List;
023import java.util.Optional;
024
025import javax.lang.model.type.TypeMirror;
026
027import org.microbean.attributes.Attributed;
028import org.microbean.attributes.Attributes;
029
030import org.microbean.constant.Constables;
031
032import static java.lang.constant.ConstantDescs.BSM_INVOKE;
033import static java.lang.constant.ConstantDescs.CD_List;
034
035import static java.util.Arrays.asList;
036
037/**
038 * A pairing of a {@link TypeMirror} with a {@link List} of {@link Attributes}s.
039 *
040 * @param type a {@link TypeMirror}
041 *
042 * @param attributes a {@link List} of {@link Attributes}s
043 *
044 * @author <a href="https://about.me/lairdnelson" target="_top">Laird Nelson</a>
045 */
046public final record AttributedType(TypeMirror type, List<Attributes> attributes) implements Attributed, Constable {
047
048  /**
049   * Creates a new {@link AttributedType}.
050   *
051   * @param type a {@link TypeMirror}; must not be {@code null}; must be a {@linkplain
052   * javax.lang.model.type.TypeKind#isPrimitive() primitive}, {@linkplain javax.lang.model.type.TypeKind#ARRAY array} or
053   * {@linkplain javax.lang.model.type.TypeKind#DECLARED declared} type
054   *
055   * @param attributes an array of {@link Attributes}; may be {@code null}
056   *
057   * @exception NullPointerException if {@code type} is {@code null}
058   *
059   * @exception IllegalArgumentException if {@code type} is the wrong kind of type
060   */
061  public AttributedType(final TypeMirror type, final Attributes... attributes) {
062    this(type, attributes == null || attributes.length <= 0 ? List.of() : asList(attributes));
063  }
064
065  /**
066   * Creates a new {@link AttributedType}.
067   *
068   * @param type a {@link TypeMirror}; must not be {@code null}; must be a {@linkplain
069   * javax.lang.model.type.TypeKind#isPrimitive() primitive}, {@linkplain javax.lang.model.type.TypeKind#ARRAY array} or
070   * {@linkplain javax.lang.model.type.TypeKind#DECLARED declared} type
071   *
072   * @param attributes a {@link List} of {@link Attributes}; must not be {@code null}
073   *
074   * @exception NullPointerException if either argument is {@code null}
075   *
076   * @exception IllegalArgumentException if {@code type} is the wrong kind of type
077   */
078  public AttributedType {
079    switch (type.getKind()) {
080    case ARRAY, BOOLEAN, BYTE, CHAR, DECLARED, DOUBLE, FLOAT, INT, LONG, SHORT:
081      break;
082    case ERROR, EXECUTABLE, INTERSECTION, MODULE, NONE, NULL, OTHER, PACKAGE, TYPEVAR, UNION, VOID, WILDCARD:
083    default:
084      throw new IllegalArgumentException("type: " + type);
085    }
086    attributes = List.copyOf(attributes);
087  }
088
089  /**
090   * Creates a new {@link AttributedType}.
091   *
092   * @param type a {@link TypeMirror}; must not be {@code null}; must be a {@linkplain
093   * javax.lang.model.type.TypeKind#isPrimitive() primitive}, {@linkplain javax.lang.model.type.TypeKind#ARRAY array} or
094   * {@linkplain javax.lang.model.type.TypeKind#DECLARED declared} type
095   *
096   * @exception NullPointerException if {@code type} is {@code null}
097   *
098   * @exception IllegalArgumentException if {@code type} is the wrong kind of type
099   */
100  public AttributedType(final TypeMirror type) {
101    this(type, List.of());
102  }
103
104  /**
105   * Returns an {@link Optional} containing a {@link ConstantDesc} describing this {@link AttributedType}, or an
106   * {@linkplain Optional#isEmpty() empty <code>Optional</code>} if it could not be described.
107   *
108   * @return an {@link Optional} containing a {@link ConstantDesc} describing this {@link AttributedType}, or an
109   * {@linkplain Optional#isEmpty() empty <code>Optional</code>} if it could not be describe; never {@code null}
110   */
111  @Override // Constable
112  public Optional<? extends ConstantDesc> describeConstable() {
113    return this.type() instanceof Constable t ? t.describeConstable() : Optional.<ConstantDesc>empty()
114      .flatMap(typeDesc -> Constables.describeConstable(this.attributes())
115               .map(attributesDesc -> DynamicConstantDesc.of(BSM_INVOKE,
116                                                             MethodHandleDesc.ofConstructor(ClassDesc.of(this.getClass().getName()),
117                                                                                            ClassDesc.of(TypeMirror.class.getName()),
118                                                                                            CD_List),
119                                                             typeDesc,
120                                                             attributesDesc)));
121  }
122
123  /**
124   * Returns an {@link AttributedType} comprising the supplied arguments.
125   *
126   * @param type a {@link TypeMirror}; must not be {@code null}; must be a {@linkplain
127   * javax.lang.model.type.TypeKind#isPrimitive() primitive}, {@linkplain javax.lang.model.type.TypeKind#ARRAY array} or
128   * {@linkplain javax.lang.model.type.TypeKind#DECLARED declared} type
129   *
130   * @param attributes an array of {@link Attributes}; may be {@code null}
131   *
132   * @return a non-{@code null} {@link AttributedType}
133   *
134   * @exception NullPointerException if {@code type} is {@code null}
135   *
136   * @exception IllegalArgumentException if {@code type} is the wrong kind of type
137   */
138  public static final AttributedType of(final TypeMirror type, Attributes... attributes) {
139    return new AttributedType(type, attributes == null || attributes.length <= 0 ? List.of() : asList(attributes));
140  }
141
142}
